price: 65. Ir (atminkite) Dieną (kai Allahas) sušuks jiems ir tars: „Kokį atsakymą davėte jūs Pasiuntiniams?“
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu mādhā ajabtumu al-mur'salīna
